CustomField.description: Calculates the value of this craft as part of the entire opportunity
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Type__c , "Hourly") ,
Ave_Bill_Rate__c * VALUE( CASE( TEXT( Opportunity.Expected_Job_Duration__c ) , "1 Week", "1", "2 Weeks", "2", "3 Weeks", "3", "1 Month", "4", "2 Months", "8", "3 Months", "12", "6 mo", "24", "1 year", "52", "52" ) ) *
VALUE(CASE( TEXT(Opportunity.Expected_Hours_Week__c) , "40", "40", "50", "55", "60", "70", "70", "85", "80", "100", "100")) * Quantity,
IF( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Charge") , Ave_Bill_Rate__c , 0) )
CustomField.label: Project Craft Value
